name: bobsled
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] a small vehicle with long metal blades under it, built for racing down tracks covered with ice: Occasionally the bobsleds crash and turn over. He rode in a bobsled for the first time yesterday.
Dmytro Aksonov/E+/GettyImages
[ U ] (also bobsledding) a sport in which you race down a track covered in ice in a small vehicle with long metal blades under it: The most popular spectator sport in the winter Olympics was bobsled. As a luge athlete, she thought bobsled was relatively easy - until she tried it.
More examplesFewer examplesBobsleds are now built to have the best possible aerodynamics with lightweight construction and alloy runners.The United States won the four-man bobsled.On the bobsled tracks, carving hundredths of a second from a team's runs can make the difference between a gold medal and also-ran status.
